msbt.message: I'm so glad to see you wearing the I gave you, ! That's so cool. I feel like an artist, painting the world with my fashion sense
You are looking good in your , yo!It's such a natural look for you, like you've been rocking that style your whole life!
You have got to tell me where you got that outfit, .I especially love your . Wait.You're wearing the that I gave you, ! How could I have parted with something so fabulous?
Am I crazy, or are you wearing the that I gave you? That's so cool! It's clear you recognize good taste.
Ooh, I like what I see Your !Don't forget who you have to thank for that look, OK?<10_4 /> It's original!
Hey, so you're wearing , right?Can you tell me more about that look? Like, you know, what was your inspiration for it? Ha! I'm kidding, I'm kidding! I know your inspiration was me.
Your says "" more than "" itself!
Hold on. I have a comment on your .You. Are. CRUSHING IT! Way to make the rest of us look like fashion fools, !
, your whole ensemble todayit is WORKING.And the really ties it together.
I think they should name the after you, because you are owning it!
That outfit is serious business, and the ? Icing on the cake. What? Icing is serious business.
My oh my The look you've come up with todayIt's fabulous! And how about the things you can do with
Oh, That outfit you're wearing is perfection. And the ? What's more perfect than perfection? Because it's that.
Do my eyes deceive me, or are you wearing ? Not everyone realizes how much impact the right footwear can make.And don't even get me started on what the WRONG footwear can do for your whole look.
That outfit you're wearing is really unusualin a good way. And you designed it yourself, you say? Very impressive. Shocking folks with original design is a lost art if you ask me, .
Whoa, are you really wearing the signature ? Do you know ? Can you get me an autograph?
Whoa, that outfit you're wearing You don't see that kind of look every day around here. Oh, it's a custom design? From ? Well, no wonder! Looks like the fashion scene on is really thriving!
Well, look at you! All fresh and fancy for spring in your !
Well, you're looking breezy, ! Glad to see you all decked out for the season. Seriously. I wish I had the good sense to be wearing .
Ooh, the season is turning and you're right there with your wardrobe. That's to say, I really dig the !
Ooh, you look toasty and trendy in your !
Oh, what are you doing?I've tried to pull off some bold fashion choices in my day, believe me. But no one can pull off in the heat of the summer!
Uhare you really wearing ?!You're not cold? Like, even a little bit? I'm cold just looking at you!
Oh, That outfit you're wearing is straight-up . And now I'm actually hungry for
Whoa. It looks like you've designed your entire outfit today around your , hm?Stunning. I'm in awe of your fashion sense, .
Whoa. You've done it. You've found the perfect blend of cute and classy with that outfit.And you know what ties it all together for me, ? Your !
There's something very cool about what you're wearing today, and I don't mean the fabric. I could see myself wearing something similar, belting out in front of a million adoring fans
YoI'm incredibly jealous of your !It's like you just leveled up in the game of fashion, !
OK, I'm more than a little jealous of how cool you look in your .Now the jealousy is turning into awewith just a hint of rage. ARRRRGHH!<10_4 /> Just kidding. Ha HA!

You know what never goes out of style? Classic stuff. Kinda like the outfit you've got on right now. Don't get me wrong. I like to get real weird with fashion, but classic stuff is classic for a reason.
Going back to the basics with your , hm?I approve. Not that you need my approval, but maybe I need yours? Do you approve of my approval?
I really like your style today. Just simple, basic, straightforward. .It's like your clothes are taking a backseat to let your personality shine, !
Whoa! You are dressed to the nines today. Maybe even the tens!What's the occasion? Launching a new fragrance? Attending a new fragrance launch? Welp, I'm out of ideas. Help me out, .
I don't know if you dance, but it LOOKS like you can dance in that outfit, .Some folks have said I have two left feet, but to me, that just means I can do weirder dances. Ha HA!
Ooh, I'm not sure you and I should stand so close to each other. We're like paparazzi magnets right now.Mostly because of the super-glam outfit you're wearingespecially .
I'm loving your outfit today, . It looks super comfy, and also super stylish. That's like the holy grail of fashion!
Oh, hey! Working out, or hardly working out? In your fancy , I mean.Sorry, I'm not used to sporty lingo. I'm more into , if you hadn't noticed.
Whoa, what's with the activewear today, ? Gonna do a little ?Oh, I just ask because of what you're wearing. Ready for adventure in your !
Hey, you're really dressed up today! You headed to the after-party?There's no "before" party that I know about, but I always ask everyone just in case. Ha HA!
Hmm, there's something about your outfit today that just screams posh.I mean, it SINGS posh in a perfect falsetto, hitting every note true. Ha HA!
, you're looking slick today. I'd call that lookunderstated but totally over the top!It's likeyou could wear that to the opera, but then tuck into a messy appetizer after. Ha!
Heh. You sure seem to wear that outfit a lot.OH! I didn't mean it that way. It looks great on you, so why wouldn't you wear it all the time? Whew. Saved it.
That outfit is getting to be, like, your signature outfit. That's good for your brand, !
There's something special about the combination of and .
I see you're still rocking your todayDid you get cast in something? Are you method acting right now?OK, OK, don't break character, but raise your left eyebrow slightly if the answer is yes!
What can I say? You look sharp in your as usual, !
I'm loving this feline-themed ensemble you've got going on today.Ooh! I hope this is the start of a hot new trend. 'Cause then I can say I had this look before it was cool.
There's something enigmatic, yet completely adorable about your vibe today, . Yeah. Whatever you're doing, keep doing it, .
Woah! You are, like, Bunny Day incarnate. And may I just say, you've achieved eggs-traordinary results. That's what I like about you. When it comes to fashion, you never hold back, .

So I noticed that you're wearing .Is something special going on today? Because I don't usually see you this dressed up, You going to a party? Is it a secret party? When does it start? You know what? It doesn't matter. If you need a DJ, I'm free.
Sweet outfit, .It can be hard to walk that fine line between nutrish and delish, but you nailed it, .
Whoa! I got jealous that there was another frog here for a second there. But it's just you, !I'm honored that you're cosplaying as me at -Con this year, .
Well, aren't you looking froggy today, ?You look like you're ready to hop right down a runway, !
That outfit you're wearing is sending a VERY strong message right now.It says, "I'm a person who knows starboard from port and isn't afraid of a little adventure."
Your outfit has me thinkingDo you think that mermaids are real? And if so, do you think they LIKE to swim, or are they just bored by it?
You know, I never thought about it before, but those can be stylish. Your , I mean.I'm not saying I'd wear one to an important audition, butmaybe for a movie about giant sharks
Did you just come from a movie set or what, ?Waitdon't tell me You got the part in that opera and I didn't! Ooh, I gotta fire my agent
You are looking SHARP today, my friend! Dare I say?Waitare you headed to a party that I wasn't invited to? Or even worsean AFTERparty?
Wow, you look downright elegant today, !I'd say you're ready for anything, from a formal dinner party with royalty to .
Whoa, look at us! Normally I'd say it's a bad idea to show up at the club looking like twins.But with you? Here? We're starting a trend, right now! Rabbit Club, !
You're looking hippity and full of hop today, . LOVE the ears and tail!

Wait, uh Are we related? Were you at the family reunion last summer?You remember? The one where I put on that experimental one-bear show about ?Oh, it's just an outfit. Probably for the best. Forget I said anything.
Going for a fuzzy and ferocious look today, eh? I like it!Don't maul me for saying it, but I can barely stand how sharp you look, !
Your hair looks incredible today! The body! <10_4 />The bounce!<10_4 /> The style! It's too much!Can you give me a shampoo recommendation? I want to look even MORE like you, !
LOVE the outfit, .I hear that faux wool is soft, shrink- proof, and completely fabulous. How does it do all that?!
I'm getting a real homemade vibe from your outfit today, .Did you get it from your mom?<10_4 /> Well, maybe she should be a fashion designerif she isn't already!

Wow, is that official DAL gear you're wearing, ?They're known for great service and customer satisfaction, but now they make high-quality activewear too?Just go with it. I'm trying to become a DAL influencer

You look like you're ready for a costume partybut are you TRULY ready, ?Have you studied your character bio? Practiced your accent? Taken the swordplay and combat classes?What do you mean, "It's not a movie"? Life's a movie when you live like me, !
Whoa! If you're dressed like that, you better have a gift for me, .<10_4 /> Ha HA! Just kidding.But, uhif you DO have a gift, I wouldn't say no
How'd you know I was casting for my latest film project, "Knights of the Gilded "? I don't know how you found out about it, but I'll mail you a copy of the NDA, and we'll go from there.
It makes total sense that you want to be a pilot, .The outfit alone commands respect. I'd buckle my seatbelt right now if you told me to, without question. You know, if I had one on me.
I can tell from your outfit that you have some experience on the ice.As a longtime fan of ice-skating slash dancing, I've always wanted to know Aren't you freezing?!

Ah, I didn't know you were the sporting type!You ready for a little footy? A little kicksy jumpsy? A bit of the old pass-shoot-dance routine? Ah, you got me. I have no idea what I'm talking about. Was it ?
Say, can you tell me where I can find the best there is to be found on ?, I'm just messing with you because of your outfit! But if you have a recommendation
What's with the disguise? What kind of sneaky plans do you have up your sleeve, ?Whatever it is, count meIN!

Oh, that outfit you're wearing takes me back, I remember being the most popular in school, captain of the teamAh, but then I threw it all away when the government needed me to go undercover and break up a spy ring.Uhsome portions of that may have been inspired by fictional events.
Ooh, going for a ride? That sounds fun, .I'd go with you, but my hairstyle isn't rated for anything above five miles an hour.
Whoa. Not everyone can pull off such a flashy outfit. But you are NOODLING right now, !Do you like that? Noodling? I'm trying to make it catch on.
Haven't I seen you in that outfit before? Wait. Is wearing the same thing over and over again hip now? Finally! I've been trying to make this happen for years, !
This is your favorite outfit, isn't it? I knew it. I have a nose for this kind of thing, . Just call me fashion detective! Ha HA!
I've always loved that outfit on you. I consider it to be the centerpiece of the aesthetic.
Whoa, look who's showing off! I'm really loving the bold look you're going for, .
There's something different about you today Did you get a haircut or something? Ha HA! I'm just teasing. I love that you're making such a bold statement. And the statement is ""!
UhOh! Sorry, I was staring, wasn't I? It's just that you look so different like that!Good different, not bad different, I mean. Whew. Saved it.
